caption:
This photograph depicts a serene, early morning scene at a calm lake. A silver canoe is moored to a jetty in the foreground, with its wooden paddles inside, lightly touching the still water. Beside it is another boat, likely a small metal rowboat.

The lake surface reflects the surrounding landscape with an almost mirror-like clarity. Mist hovers above the lake, adding a mystical quality to the setting. On the other side of the lake, you can see a cluster of slender, tall trees, likely birch, grouped closely together on a small islet or peninsula. 

In the background, the terrain rises gently into wooded hills and small mountains visible under a light morning haze. The overall atmosphere is tranquil and untouched, hinting at either early morning or late evening, when the light is soft and muted. The setting suggests a remote or secluded area where nature predominates.
title: Early morning at Malibu lake in the santa monica mountains near Malibu, California, which is located on the northwestern edge of Los Angeles county.  The mountains contain the last semi-Wilderness in Los Angeles county.  This area so far has escaped intensive development pressure.  Some 84 percent of the state's residents live within 30 miles of the coast, and this concentration has resulted in increasing land use pressure
